profile:
Our owner has been working in the industry for over 6 years and has worked on projects from small residential renovations to large scale projects like the demolition of the Port Mann Bridge in 2013.

All of our staff are trained and experienced in the removal and disposal of hazardous materials such as lead, asbestos, mould and other hazardous materials. In addition to their current credentials here at TCO we strive to always be advancing our education to stay up to date with the current rules and regulations in our industry.

TCO Environmental is insured and covered by WorkSafeBC so that should the unexpected occur, you can rest easy that no liabililty will fall on you, the customer. 

Our goal is to provide safe, high quality, yet affordable abatement solutions to customers looking to remove and dispose of hazardous materials without the risk of exposure  to themselves  or their loved ones.
